title: How to apply filter on a SAP BI report?
body:
I have a report which is having data

State Lines Revenue
dsj   dgghf 2545
dsj   dbvf  2545
dsj   ddd   2545
ggd   dggc 3466
dhgd  dghf 3674
dhfg  fdhg 4477

Now i want to retrieve only data where state is 'dsj'

http://localhost:6405/biprws/raylight/v1/documents/6127/reports/2/

How can i apply filter to the above url to make GET request?
